meanings.definition: Specific details or information about something
meanings.sent1: She always pays attention to the particulars when reading a book.
meanings.sent2: The detective carefully noted down all the particulars of the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fascination with the mouse's particulars made for a comical chase.
meanings.sent4: In the world of art, the painter captures the particulars of nature in a breathtaking way.
meanings.sent5: Remembering the particulars of the recipe is crucial for baking a perfect cake.

meanings.definition: A specific item or thing, especially in a list or group
meanings.sent1: The shopkeeper displayed the particulars of the new products in the window.
meanings.sent2: Among all the particulars on the menu, the burger was her favorite.
meanings.sent3: The particulars of the treasure hunt led them to unexpected places.
meanings.sent4: Each star in the sky is a particular in the vast universe.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to identify the particulars in the historical document.
